title: Your OCE guide to the Mid-Season Invitational

replies.body:
While I'm sure that IMay vs QG was a hype match, it was only Round 1 of the LPL Spring Playoffs. The LPL representative for MSI hasn't been decided yet. 

Otherwise, great article! Maybe you could do a follow-up article with a closer look at the three other teams in the Dire Wolves play-in group at MSI?
Thanks for the catch VileHex, and watch this space for the group analysis follow up... :)
Thanks for the flag VileHex! The article has been changed to reflect this, also not a bad idea for an article...
Thank you for writing these articles! They are very informative and helpful to newer players! Keen for the Groups A analysis!
